faq.question: Why invitation only?
faq.answer: Video hosting is pricey ðŸ’¸. We can't afford huge virtual space at the moment, so every megabyte counts. Apologies for the inconvenience.

faq.question: Can I pay to get more space?
faq.answer: We're working on it ðŸ’¾. But we don't have an ETA yet.

faq.question: Where is my invite?
faq.answer: Did you check your spam box? If you didn't receive it, we might ran out of available slots. We're working on having more capacity, thanks for your patience!
